abstract: The Gores Group was hoping to reopen talks with Polycom about a merger between the largest independent videoconferencing equipment company and one of the private equity firm’s portfolio companies, Siemens Enterprise Communications, The Financial Times reported.
snippet: The Gores Group was hoping to reopen talks with Polycom about a merger between the largest independent videoconferencing equipment company and one of the private equity firm’s portfolio companies, Siemens Enterprise Communications, The Financial T...
lead_paragraph: The Gores Group was hoping to reopen talks with Polycom about a merger between the largest independent video-conferencing equipment company and one of the private equity firm’s portfolio companies, Siemens Enterprise Communications, The Financial Times reported.

headline.main: Gores Said to Seek New Deal Talks With Polycom
